iipda:rdbms.iipda:content: SELECT FATC.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD financialAgreementTypeCode, DISB.DSB_ID recordId, DISB.CMPY_ID companyId, DISB.CMPY_ORG_UNT_ID companyOrganizationUnitId, DISB.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD_DRV financialAgreementTypeCode, DISB.PAY_METH_PRF_CD disbursementMethodPaymentCode, DISB.DSB_TYP_CD disbursementTypeCode, DISB.DSB_PRNT_GRP_CD disbursementPrintGroupCode, DISB.DIPO_CD disbursementInPaymentOfCode, DISB.DSB_DIPO_NM_DRV disbursementInPaymentOfName, DISB.DSB_RQST_NO disbursementRequestNumber, DISB.DSB_NO disbursementNumber, DISB.DSB_CREA_DT disbursementCreationDate, DISB.DSB_AMT disbursementAmount, DISB.DSB_CMNT comment, STATUS.DSB_STT_TYP_CD stateCode, STATUS.DSB_STS_TYP_CD statusCode, STATUS.DSB_STS_RSN_CD statusReasonCode, DISB.DSB_MNL_CHCK_IND manualCheckIndicator, DISB.DSB_ON_DMND_IND onDemand, DISB.EFF_DTM effectiveDate, DISB.END_DTM endDate FROM DISBURSEMENT DISB INNER JOIN FINANCIAL_AGREEMENT_TYPE_CD FATC ON FATC.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD = DISB.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD_DRV INNER JOIN DISBURSEMENT_STATUS STATUS ON DISB.DSB_ID=STATUS.DSB_ID AND STATUS.END_DTM IS NULL AND FATC.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD = 'clm' AND Dialect.getDateOnlyExpression(DISB.EFF_DTM) > :startDate AND Dialect.getDateOnlyExpression(DISB.EFF_DTM) <= :endDate AND ((STATUS.DSB_STT_TYP_CD IN('incomp','opn') AND STATUS.DSB_STS_TYP_CD IN ('incomp_pay')) OR (STATUS.AUDT_USER_CREA_ID NOT IN (6000302) AND STATUS.DSB_STS_TYP_CD IN ('pay_stp_niss', 'pay_vd_niss'))) LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT DPD.DSB_ID FROM DISBURSEMENT_PAYABLE_DRV DPD JOIN CLM_FNCL_TRAN_CLM_ASMT_SURCHR CFTCAS ON CFTCAS.FTC_ID_ASMT_SURCHR = DPD.FTC_ID JOIN DISBURSEMENT_PAYABLE_DRV DPD2 ON DPD2.FTC_ID = CFTCAS.FTC_ID JOIN DISBURSEMENT_STATUS DS ON DS.DSB_ID = DPD2.DSB_ID AND DS.END_DTM IS NULL AND DS.DSB_STT_TYP_CD = 'incomp' AND DS.DSB_STS_TYP_CD = 'incomp_pay') T ON T.DSB_ID = DISB.DSB_ID WHERE T.DSB_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT FATC.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD financialAgreementTypeCode, DISB.DSB_ID recordId, DISB.CMPY_ID companyId, DISB.CMPY_ORG_UNT_ID companyOrganizationUnitId, DISB.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD_DRV financialAgreementTypeCode, DISB.PAY_METH_PRF_CD disbursementMethodPaymentCode, DISB.DSB_TYP_CD disbursementTypeCode, DISB.DSB_PRNT_GRP_CD disbursementPrintGroupCode, DISB.DIPO_CD disbursementInPaymentOfCode, DISB.DSB_DIPO_NM_DRV disbursementInPaymentOfName, DISB.DSB_RQST_NO disbursementRequestNumber, DISB.DSB_NO disbursementNumber, DISB.DSB_CREA_DT disbursementCreationDate, DISB.DSB_AMT disbursementAmount, DISB.DSB_CMNT comment, STATUS.DSB_STT_TYP_CD stateCode, STATUS.DSB_STS_TYP_CD statusCode, STATUS.DSB_STS_RSN_CD statusReasonCode, DISB.DSB_MNL_CHCK_IND manualCheckIndicator, DISB.DSB_ON_DMND_IND onDemand, DISB.EFF_DTM effectiveDate, DISB.END_DTM endDate FROM DISBURSEMENT DISB INNER JOIN FINANCIAL_AGREEMENT_TYPE_CD FATC ON FATC.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD = DISB.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD_DRV INNER JOIN DISBURSEMENT_STATUS STATUS ON DISB.DSB_ID=STATUS.DSB_ID AND STATUS.END_DTM IS NULL AND FATC.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD = 'clm' AND Dialect.getDateOnlyExpression(DISB.EFF_DTM) > :startDate AND Dialect.getDateOnlyExpression(DISB.EFF_DTM) <= :endDate AND DISB.DSB_MNL_CHCK_IND='y' AND STATUS.DSB_STT_TYP_CD IN('opn') AND STATUS.DSB_STS_TYP_CD IN('iss_pay') AND STATUS.DSB_STS_RSN_CD NOT IN ('snt_pay_prcssr')
iipda:rdbms.iipda:description: Export payment query for creating batch for billing and agency Context. Will remove these context once Policy processor will be implemented.

iipda:rdbms.iipda:content: SELECT FATC.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD financialAgreementTypeCode, DISB.DSB_ID recordId, DISB.CMPY_ID companyId, DISB.CMPY_ORG_UNT_ID companyOrganizationUnitId, DISB.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD_DRV financialAgreementTypeCode, DISB.PAY_METH_PRF_CD disbursementMethodPaymentCode, DISB.DSB_TYP_CD disbursementTypeCode, DISB.DSB_PRNT_GRP_CD disbursementPrintGroupCode, DISB.DIPO_CD disbursementInPaymentOfCode, DISB.DSB_DIPO_NM_DRV disbursementInPaymentOfName, DISB.DSB_RQST_NO disbursementRequestNumber, DISB.DSB_NO disbursementNumber, DISB.DSB_CREA_DT disbursementCreationDate, DISB.DSB_AMT disbursementAmount, DISB.DSB_CMNT comment, STATUS.DSB_STT_TYP_CD stateCode, STATUS.DSB_STS_TYP_CD statusCode, DISB.DSB_MNL_CHCK_IND manualCheckIndicator, DISB.DSB_ON_DMND_IND onDemand, DISB.EFF_DTM effectiveDate, DISB.END_DTM endDate FROM DISBURSEMENT DISB INNER JOIN FINANCIAL_AGREEMENT_TYPE_CD FATC ON FATC.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD = DISB.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD_DRV INNER JOIN DISBURSEMENT_STATUS STATUS ON DISB.DSB_ID=STATUS.DSB_ID AND FATC.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD = 'clm' AND STATUS.DSB_STT_TYP_CD IN('incomp','opn') AND STATUS.DSB_STS_RSN_CD IN ('snt_pay_prcssr') AND STATUS.EFF_DTM > :startDate AND STATUS.EFF_DTM <= :endDate WHERE DISB.CMPY_ID IS NOT NULL

SELECT FATC.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD financialAgreementTypeCode, DISB.DSB_ID recordId, DISB.CMPY_ID companyId, DISB.CMPY_ORG_UNT_ID companyOrganizationUnitId, DISB.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD_DRV financialAgreementTypeCode, DISB.PAY_METH_PRF_CD disbursementMethodPaymentCode, DISB.DSB_TYP_CD disbursementTypeCode, DISB.DSB_PRNT_GRP_CD disbursementPrintGroupCode, DISB.DIPO_CD disbursementInPaymentOfCode, DISB.DSB_DIPO_NM_DRV disbursementInPaymentOfName, DISB.DSB_RQST_NO disbursementRequestNumber, DISB.DSB_NO disbursementNumber, DISB.DSB_CREA_DT disbursementCreationDate, DISB.DSB_AMT disbursementAmount, DISB.DSB_CMNT comment, STATUS.DSB_STT_TYP_CD stateCode, STATUS.DSB_STS_TYP_CD statusCode, DISB.DSB_MNL_CHCK_IND manualCheckIndicator, DISB.DSB_ON_DMND_IND onDemand, DISB.EFF_DTM effectiveDate, DISB.END_DTM endDate FROM DISBURSEMENT DISB INNER JOIN FINANCIAL_AGREEMENT_TYPE_CD FATC ON FATC.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD = DISB.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD_DRV INNER JOIN DISBURSEMENT_STATUS STATUS ON DISB.DSB_ID=STATUS.DSB_ID AND STATUS.DSB_STT_TYP_CD IN('incomp','opn', 'comp') AND FATC.FNCL_AGRE_TYP_CD = 'clm' AND Dialect.getDateOnlyExpression(DISB.EFF_DTM) >= :startDate AND Dialect.getDateOnlyExpression(DISB.EFF_DTM) <= :endDate AND STATUS.DSB_STS_TYP_CD IN (:statusCodes) AND STATUS.END_DTM IS NULL WHERE DISB.CMPY_ID IS NOT NULL
iipda:rdbms.iipda:description: Retrieve list of disbursement records for a given effective date range and status code.

iipda:sql-fragment.iipda:fragment-sql: SELECT PPN.PARTY_ID, CASE WHEN PPN.PARTY_PERS_NM_NM_DISP_DRV IS NOT NULL THEN LTRIM(COALESCE(PPN.PARTY_PERS_NM_NM_FST,'')Dialect.getConcatenationOperator()' ')Dialect.getConcatenationOperator()LTRIM(COALESCE(PPN.PARTY_PERS_NM_NM_MID,'')Dialect.getConcatenationOperator()' 'Dialect.getConcatenationOperator()PPN.PARTY_PERS_NM_NM_LST) ELSE PON.PARTY_ORG_NM_NM END Dialect.getAsKeyword() ParticipantName , CP.PTCP_TYP_CD participationType, CCP.PARTY_PARTY_NO customerNumber, PTI.PARTY_TAX_ID_TAX_ID_NO taxIdNumber, PA.PARTY_ADDR_LN1_TXT addressLine1 , PA.PARTY_ADDR_LN2_TXT addressLine2 , PA.PARTY_ADDR_CITY_NM addressCity , PSR.PSTL_SERV_RGN_ABRV addressState , PSRC.CNTRY_CD addressCountry , PA.PARTY_ADDR_PSTL_CD addressZipcode FROM CLAIM CC JOIN CLAIM_PARTICIPATION CP ON CP.CLM_ID = CC.CLM_ID

AND CP.CLM_PTCP_EFF_DT <= :curdatetime AND ( CP.CLM_PTCP_END_DT > :curdatetime OR CP.CLM_PTCP_END_DT IS NULL) JOIN PARTY CCP ON CCP.PARTY_ID = CP.PARTY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PARTY_PERSON_NAME PPN ON PPN.PARTY_ID = CCP.PARTY_ID AND PPN.PERS_NM_TYP_CD ='lgl_nm' AND PPN.PARTY_PERS_NM_EFF_DT <= :curdatetime AND ( PPN.PARTY_PERS_NM_END_DT > :curdatetime OR PPN.PARTY_PERS_NM_END_DT IS NULL ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PARTY_ORGANIZATION_NAME PON ON PON.PARTY_ID = CCP.PARTY_ID AND PON.ORG_NM_TYP_CD ='lgl_nm' AND PON.PARTY_ORG_NM_EFF_DTM <= :curdatetime AND ( PON.PARTY_ORG_NM_END_DTM > :curdatetime OR PON.PARTY_ORG_NM_END_DTM IS NULL ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PARTY_TAX_IDENTIFIER PTI ON PTI.PARTY_ID = CCP.PARTY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PARTY_ADDRESS PA ON PA.PARTY_ID = CCP.PARTY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN POSTAL_SERVICE_REGION_CD PSR ON PSR.PSTL_SERV_RGN_ID = PA.PSTL_SERV_RGN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN POSTAL_SERVICE_REGION_TYPE_CD PSRC on PSRC.PSTL_SERV_RGN_TYP_CD = PSR.PSTL_SERV_RGN_TYP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN PARTY_ADDRESS_USAGE PAU ON PAU.PARTY_ADDR_ID = PA.PARTY_ADDR_ID AND PAU.AGRE_TYP_CD = 'clm' AND PAU.USG_TYP_CD = 'mail_addr' AND PAU.PARTY_ADDR_USG_EFF_DT <= :curdatetime AND ( PAU.PARTY_ADDR_USG_END_DT > :curdatetime OR PAU.PARTY_ADDR_USG_END_DT IS NULL ) AND ( ( :currentMonth BETWEEN PAU.MM_ID_USG_STRT_MM AND PAU.MM_ID_USG_END_MM ) OR ( PAU.MM_ID_USG_STRT_MM =:currentMonth AND PAU.PARTY_ADDR_USG_USG_STRT_DD <= :currentDay ) OR ( PAU.MM_ID_USG_END_MM = :currentMonth AND PAU.PARTY_ADDR_USG_USG_END_DD >= :currentDay ) ) AND PAU.PARTY_ADDR_USG_EFF_DT <= :curdatetime AND ( PAU.PARTY_ADDR_USG_END_DT > :curdatetime OR PAU.PARTY_ADDR_USG_END_DT IS NULL ) where CC.CLM_ID = :claimId

iipda:rdbms.iipda:description: Retrieves a list of all claim participants. Dynamic query fragments retrieving a list of all claim participants.

iipda:rdbms.iipda:content: select DBI.CBA_ID_CMPY id, Distinct(CBAC.CMPY_BANK_ACCT_NM) value from DISBURSEMENT_BANKING_INFO DBI JOIN COMPANY_BANK_ACCOUNT_CD CBAC ON CBAC.CMPY_BANK_ACCT_ID = DBI.CBA_ID_CMPY where DBI.CBA_ID_CMPY IN (:companyBankAccountIdList)
iipda:rdbms.iipda:description: Retrieve Company Bank Name By Id List

iipda:rdbms.iipda:content: select DBI.PARTY_BANK_ACCT_ID_PAYE id, Distinct(PBA.PARTY_BANK_ACCT_ACCT_NM) value from DISBURSEMENT_BANKING_INFO DBI JOIN PARTY_BANK_ACCOUNT PBA ON PBA.PARTY_BANK_ACCT_ID = DBI.PARTY_BANK_ACCT_ID_PAYE AND PBA.PARTY_BANK_ACCT_EFF_DT <= :curdatetime AND ( PBA.PARTY_BANK_ACCT_END_DT > :curdatetime OR PBA.PARTY_BANK_ACCT_END_DT IS NULL ) where DBI.PARTY_BANK_ACCT_ID_PAYE IN (:partyBankAccountIdPayeeList)
iipda:rdbms.iipda:description: Retrieve Payee Bank Account Name By Id List
